name: taxi-service
description: ## User stories: ### Client 1. As a Client, I want to create a ride request, so that I can get a taxi. 2. As a Client, I want to see my ride requests, so that I can see the status of my requests. 3. As a Client, I want to see the bids by various fleets on my ride request, so that I can accept the best one. 4. As a Client, I want to accept a bid, so that I can get a taxi.
